api.forbidden: You're not allowed to access this resource
api.socket_error: Not a valid host or no internet connection
api.socket_timeout: Request timed out - please ensure your internet connection is stable and that you're connecting to a valid FileBin instance and that it's not under heavy load
api.general_rest_error: An unknown error occurred during communication
api.general_rest_error_payload: An unknown error occurred during communication: {message}

app.title: FileBin Mobile
app.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, please try again

compatibility_dialog.title: How to login?
compatibility_dialog.body: A FileBin instance >= 3.5.0 and a valid API key with at least access-level 'apikey' is required.

errors.no_protocol: URLs need to include a valid protocol like http:// or https://
errors.invalid_url: Please provide a valid FileBin URL
errors.forbidden: You're not allowed to access this instance

about.headline: Welcome to FileBin mobile!
about.description:
This application is a mobile client for FileBin and it's open source. It helps you to manage your pastes.

In order to use the application, you need access to a FileBin instance and an API key to sign in. It's recommended that the API key has at least 'apikey' access-level.

dialog.title: Link opening failed
dialog.description: Could not open '{link}'. Please ensure that you have an application installed which handles opening such link types.
